headline: Sea (SE) and Microsoft (MSFT), PAR Technology (PAR) Shares Plummet, What You Need To Know
summary: A number of stocks fell in the afternoon session after China imposed a 34% tariff on all U.S. imports amid escalating trade war tensions. This was partly in response to the "reciprocal tariffs" announced by the Trump administration the previous day, with levies on Chinese goods estimated to be as high as 50%.

headline: Microsoft, turning 50, dials up Copilot actions to stay in AI game
summary: REDMOND, Wash (Reuters) -Thousands of people swooned in a dark conference hall that felt more like a rock concert when a Microsoft product manager demonstrated the company's latest feature: how to sum numbers in Excel, with the click of a button.  "It was literally like Mick Jagger walked out," said Yusuf Mehdi, Microsoft's consumer chief marketing officer, who started as an intern.  On Friday, the day Microsoft turned 50, the company's leaders and staff gathered at its Redmond headquarters to remember the software maker's glory days while trumpeting what they hope will bring it into the future: more powerful artificial intelligence.

raw.headline: Microsoft, turning 50, dials up Copilot actions to stay in AI game
raw.summary: REDMOND, Wash (Reuters) -Thousands of people swooned in a dark conference hall that felt more like a rock concert when a Microsoft product manager demonstrated the company's latest feature: how to sum numbers in Excel, with the click of a button.  "It was literally like Mick Jagger walked out," said Yusuf Mehdi, Microsoft's consumer chief marketing officer, who started as an intern.  On Friday, the day Microsoft turned 50, the company's leaders and staff gathered at its Redmond headquarters to remember the software maker's glory days while trumpeting what they hope will bring it into the future: more powerful artificial intelligence.

summary: The Nasdaq Composite, one of the U.S. stock market's three main indexes, has had an interesting few months. One way is through the Nasdaq-100, a subset of the Nasdaq Composite that contains the largest 100 non-financial companies trading on the Nasdaq stock exchange.
